pageContext.collection_description: Contains mainly scripts for radio programs written by Mies and other materials relating to his work in radio and television, 1953-1978. Includes scripts for The Gold Coast Show, Concert or Corn, Would You Believe It, and Secession Report (with scripts for commercials), which was a radio news show that reported occurrences in the 1860s and was aired during the centennial of the Civil War, 1953-1962. Also includes one audio cassette with a 1961 episode of the Secession Report and a 1955 episode of The Gold Coast Show.
